origin.dsmorigins.elf.name: Elfliander
origin.dsmorigins.elf.description: An advanced Human species blessed with Magic who believe they are far better then humans.
origin.dsmorigins.mushlin.name: Mushlin
origin.dsmorigins.mushlin.description: Natives of Mushroom Islands that infect only humans, taking over the mind for personal use.
origin.dsmorigins.keeper.name: Russet Copperite
origin.dsmorigins.keeper.description: A human hybrid fused with Copper using Magic that Utilizes it's powers for personal gain.
power.dsmorigins.not_swimmer.name: Inexperienced Swimmer
power.dsmorigins.gravely_fear.name: Thanatophobia
power.dsmorigins.gravely_fear.descriptio: You deal 30% less damage to Undead enemies.
power.dsmorigins.enchanted_arrows_recipe: You are able to craft Poison Arrows by using a Moss Block and surrounding it with arrows in the crafting table.
power.dsmorigins.allergic.name: Terrible Weaponinist
power.dsmorigins.allergic.description: You are horrible at welding Melee Weapons, you deal 20% less damage with them.
power.dsmorigins.wild_expert.name: Wild Expertise
power.dsmorigins.wild_expert.description: As you grew up in Forested Biomes, you move 10% faster in them.
power.dsmorigins.equipaccessory.name: Accessories
power.dsmorigins.equipaccessory.descript: Press your Use Item key to equip a Accessory, to unequip a accessory hold shift and press your Primary Origin Key.
power.dsmorigins.accessoriesbud.name: Amethyst Necklace
power.dsmorigins.accessoriesbud.descript: Accessory: Provides immunity to Poison while worn
power.dsmorigins.accessoriesbudding.name: Budding Necklace
power.dsmorigins.accessoriesbudding.desc: Accessory: Provides immunity to Poison and increases Regeneration.
power.dsmorigins.accessorybarter.name: Death Barter
power.dsmorigins.accessorybarter.descrip: Accessory: If you are holding 50 Emeralds in your off-hand, prevent death and heal to full. *Removes Emeralds and Accessory*.
power.dsmorigins.accessorybone.name: Bone Bracelet
power.dsmorigins.accessorydash.name: Bracket Piston
power.dsmorigins.accessorydash.descripti: Accessory: Allows the player to Dash using Primary Origin Key
power.dsmorigins.accessorydeepfreeze.des: Accessory: Freezes the Player, slowing them however preventing damage from Lava, Fire and Freezing. Slightly increases Lava Vision
power.dsmorigins.accessorynote.name: Noted Shoes
power.dsmorigins.accessorynote.descripti: Accessory: Plays notes while moving, a different note for each different action of movement.
power.dsmorigins.mushyhunger.name: Bloom
power.dsmorigins.mushyhunger.description: Convert half a hunger into 4 Mushroom Blocks by using the Primary Origin Key
power.dsmorigins.mushlin_stats.name: Spore Skin
power.dsmorigins.mushlin_stats.descripti: Your human body is far weaker, you naturally have 3 less hearts.
power.dsmorigins.mushroomeating.name: Invalid Digestion
power.dsmorigins.mushroomeating.descript: You'd never consider eating your own kind, as such you are unable to eat Mushroom Stew, Rabbit Stew, and Suspicious Stews.
power.dsmorigins.hard_cap.name: Morphology
power.dsmorigins.hard_cap.description: You can wear Mushrooms and Fungi on your human vessel by right clicking one in your hand, Red Mushrooms provide two additonal hearts and an increase in damage, Brown Mushrooms increase movement speed, Crimson Fungus increases mining speed by 35%, Warped Fungus increases swimming speed by 10%.
power.dsmorigins.nonthathungry.name: Barely Hungry
power.dsmorigins.nohelments.name: No Helmets
power.dsmorigins.mushroom_plant.name: Deep Rooted
power.dsmorigins.mushroom_plant.descript: You can Root yourself to the Earth to gain Regeneration, however you'll be unable to move and need to be on the ground, activated by holding the Secondary Origin Key.
power.dsmorigins.mushroomisland.name: Home Turf
power.dsmorigins.mushroomisland.descript: You gain a 40% speed boost in Mushroom Biomes.
power.dsmorigins.decaystore.name: Rusting
power.dsmorigins.decaystore.description: Rusting requires the Player to keep down a new meter called Rust, the lower your Rust the lower your stats. This effects Armor, Speed, Attack Speed, Damage.
power.dsmorigins.decayhot.name: Hot Conditions
power.dsmorigins.decayhot.description: In hot biomes you rust faster, while on fire you rust at an insanely accelerated rate.
power.dsmorigins.no_food.name: No Hunger
power.dsmorigins.no_food.description: As you are made of Copper, you don't need to eat food.
power.dsmorigins.waxed.name: Cleansing
power.dsmorigins.waxed.description: Using Amethyst you can Scape off Rust, you can also clear a ton of rust using Honeycomb + an Axe and finally you can use Copper Ingots to repair yourself.
power.dsmorigins.corrosion.name: Corrosion
power.dsmorigins.corrosion.description: When you strike a Foe with your Fist, Remove some of their hunger and give them Weakness as long as you have below 10 Rust.
power.dsmorigins.copper1.name: Copper Body
power.dsmorigins.copper1.description: Your skin has an Orange Tint.
power.dsmorigins.waterignore.name: Heavy
power.dsmorigins.waterignore.description: You're movement isn't affected by Water.
power.dsmorigins.lightning.name: Conductor
power.dsmorigins.lightning.description: When you melee strike a Foe with a Trident in the rain, summon a lightning strike on them.
power.dsmorigins.bow_master.name: Improved Archery
power.dsmorigins.bow_master.description: You deal 20% more damage with crossbows and bows.
